body.p: Dear Sir I sent you my Pertision sighned by 20 or 30 of Our best Citizsens on saturday Last you must excuse me for sending it in the way I did For i had no money to come Down my selfe or sen any one Tharefore i was compelled to send It in the way i did i wish you wold releive me if you Can posibbly, do so as i hav But af few days to go on And hav no money to pay it with by so doing you will oblige Very Respectfully
